changes.rscadd: Lux offerings to the Matthios idol now count towards overall bandit contributions and are triumph capped together with them.

changes.rscdel: Deleted triumph loss from seeing your spouse die, resisting conversions and returning to lobby from assasins's dagger.

changes.bugfix: Honor duels now reward victories properly.
Dendor task \"Butcher animals\" now works properly.
Fixed a case where notable people were not assigned properly.
